/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, their metallic bodies gleaming under the soft sunlight. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, adding depth to the vast expanse. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. This image is a beautiful representation of everyday life in Beijing, capturing the harmony between nature and urban development.
